overview: Being the father of a big family is stressful. Luckily Asa, the maid, can lighten Tommy's load.  Who needs to hide away in the bedroom to spend quality time with her boyfriend? Not Chanel.  Lily is home from college, and her boyfriend needs a guarantee that she still has feelings for him.  Tanya can't have her daughter's ex-boyfriends coming around, so she sends him away with a parting gift.  Also home from college, Victoria can't wait to kick off some holiday action.
title: Filthy Family 4
